about_the_game:
Storage Guys is a casual multiplayer co-op game where you and your friends take on the role of storage crew.


Your job is to receive items at the input ports, sort and organize them in your warehouse, and ship them out through the correct output ports. Every successful shipment makes you money! Each item is labeled with an output region, so you’ll need to sort and ship them to the matching output ports. But watch out for expiration dates, you need to send items out before they expire!



Manage a wide variety of incoming items, each with its own storage needs. Some require extra care, while others are easier to handle. Use specialized storage rooms called compounds to handle items with specific storing requirements, such as Freezer, Hazard, and UV compounds.



Hire and manage AI workers to assist with item handling, boosting productivity and automating your storage workflow. Manage the power room and ensure you have enough fuel for the engines to keep your storage running. Access the Storage Terminal to track and manage your storage costs, you’re in control of the budget. Inspections occur at random times, so keep everything in order and avoid any suspicious activity!


Access the Shop through the Storage Terminal to purchase Shelves, Compounds, Equipment, and Decorations for your storage. As you earn money, you can expand your storage space, allowing you to grow your business and store more items. Customize your storage to enhance functionality and improve its look. Use different shelves, add compounds and equipment, and decorate to make your storage unique and attractive.



At night, when the storage is closed, smugglers may offer you 'hot' (illegal) items to take and hide for them. Store these items in a secret room to keep them hidden from inspections. You can only ship them at night, and they can bring you significant profits. Black market activities can range from stolen art pieces to managing an illegal sugar production line.



Start as a worker and progress to become a storage manager! Ship more items, earn money, and level up to unlock rewards and new progression levels. Unlock achievements and take on unique challenges to test your storage skills. Gain positive reputation for legal work and negative reputation for black market deals.

name: Storage Guys

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 - 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 / AMD Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 390
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 - 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 / AMD Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 480
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 15 GB available space

short_description: Team up with friends and run your own storage! Receive, store and ship items to make a profit. Handle everything from boxes to hazardous goods. Design and expand your warehouse, manage costs, power and staff. Make deals with smugglers at night, just keep it hidden from inspection.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese, Russian
